subject: Simsonn vam motors
description_text:
Hi,

I recently purchased the vam linear pedal motor set for the simsonn pro plus x pedals.

I have plugged them in and calibrated them okay, however using the software I can only seem to get any feedback in Assetto Corsa Competizione.

I want to get them up and running in iracing.

How would I do this?

Many thanks,

conversations.body_text: Hi Max Waddell,     We currently support 10 racing games, and telemetry support for iRacing will be completed this week. You can use SIMHUB, as weâ€™ve already integrated with it. SIMHUB supports up to 100 racing titles, covering nearly all major games. I can provide you with an internal version for now, as the official SIMHUB update will be released a bit later.  https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QrSbAvCC5iyx9XgdRgSQV-hWpmDGkujc/view?usp=sharing

What a legend!

Thank you very much.

>
